Uses of Class
simulator.method.SimulationMethod

  • Packages that use SimulationMethod 
    Package Description
    prism
    The main Prism API, the command-line tool, and Java classes for symbolic data structures and algorithms.
    simulator
    The discrete event simulation engine and approximate (statistical) model checking code.
    simulator.method
    Implementation of approximate/statistical model checking techniques using the discrete event simulation engine.
    simulator.sampler
    Code for checking properties against simulation paths generated by discrete event simulation engine.
    userinterface
    PRISM's graphical user interface (GUI).

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private SimulationMethod PrismCL.processSimulationOptions(Expression expr)
      Process the simulation-related command-line options and generate a SimulationMethod object to be used for approximate model checking.

    • Uses of SimulationMethod in simulator.method

      Subclasses of SimulationMethod in simulator.method 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ACIconfidence
      SimulationMethod class for the ACI ("asymptotic confidence interval") approach.
      class  ACIiterations
      SimulationMethod class for the ACI ("asymptotic confidence interval") approach.
      class  ACIwidth
      SimulationMethod class for the ACI ("asymptotic confidence interval") approach.
      class  APMCapproximation
      SimulationMethod class for the APMC ("approximate probabilistic model checking") approach of Herault/Lassaigne/Magniette/Peyronnet (VMCAI'04).
      class  APMCconfidence
      SimulationMethod class for the APMC ("approximate probabilistic model checking") approach of Herault/Lassaigne/Magniette/Peyronnet (VMCAI'04).
      class  APMCiterations
      SimulationMethod class for the APMC ("approximate probabilistic model checking") approach of Herault/Lassaigne/Magniette/Peyronnet (VMCAI'04).
      class  APMCMethod
      SimulationMethod class(es) for the APMC ("approximate probabilistic model checking") approach of Herault/Lassaigne/Magniette/Peyronnet (VMCAI'04).
      class  CIconfidence
      SimulationMethod class for the CI ("confidence interval") approach.
      class  CIiterations
      SimulationMethod class for the CI ("confidence interval") approach.
      class  CIMethod
      SimulationMethod class(es) for the CI ("confidence interval") approach.
      class  CIwidth
      SimulationMethod class for the CI ("confidence interval") approach.
      class  SPRTMethod
      SimulationMethod class for the SPRT (Sequential probability ratio test) approach, as used by Younes/Simmons (CAV'02).
